look.default: You look around, but see nothing

look.error: To look at something in particular, use 'examine $1'

examine.error: What do you want to examine? Use 'examine ...'

go.error: Where do you want to go? Use 'go ...'

entrance hall.desc:
You stand in the entrance hall of the IX Hackathon.

There is a snack table and a tired co-op.

The doors to the hack room are open.

examine.msg: The table is full of snacks, and a small cheese knife.
The knife has blood on it...
This co-op is so tired that they don't realize they are bleeding!
The doors to the hack room are open.

hack room.desc:
You are in the hack room of the IX Hackathon.

The room is busy, but your station is empty. Where is your team?

There is a door back to the entrance hall.

examine.msg: The doors to the entrance hall are open.
